column4: I cant get to the desktop on Ubuntu, the Startx command will not work, i installed without using a disk
I cant get to the desktop on Ubuntu, the Startx command will not work, i installed without using a disk
when i run the startx command it says im missing a directory
It says im missing the directory /etc/X11/X
It says im missing the directory /etc/X11/X
It says im missing the directory /etc/X11/X whenever i try to run the startx command
if it says unknown using that do sudo apt-get install gedit
alright try nano instead of gedit
(save + exit is accomplished by pressing ctrl x and accepting)
if you are still here, i would like to thank you so much =D its all better now
your welcome ;-) glad it worked out for yo
